efaidnbmnnnibpcajpcglclefindmkaj.name: Adobe Acrobat: PDF edit, convert, sign tools
efaidnbmnnnibpcajpcglclefindmkaj.summary: Legitimate Adobe PDF extension with 339M users. Loads and executes remote JavaScript from Adobe's CDN via innerHTML injection, creating supply chain risk if CDN compromised. Also has CustomEvent SSRF patterns and outdated jQuery.

llbcnfanfmjhpedaedhbcnpgeepdnnok.name: Online Security
llbcnfanfmjhpedaedhbcnpgeepdnnok.summary: ReasonLabs enterprise security extension with 13M users. Performs URL scanning, download monitoring, malicious extension detection. Collects browsing history, cookies, downloads, and installed extensions, transmitting to ReasonLabs infrastructure. Uses native messaging for endpoint protection.

aopddeflghjljihihabdclejbojaomaf.name: AnyDoc Translator - Translate Web and PDF
aopddeflghjljihihabdclejbojaomaf.summary: Translation extension by WPS (Kingsoft) that transmits documents and web content to WPS servers and Microsoft Translator API for translation services.

difoiogjjojoaoomphldepapgpbgkhkb.name: Sider: Chat with all AI: GPT-5, Claude, DeepSeek, Gemini, Grok
difoiogjjojoaoomphldepapgpbgkhkb.summary: AI assistant sidebar for multiple models (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini). Transmits usage telemetry to sider.ai servers and reads OpenAI cookies for integration.

golbdgciocipijcnkhfjbljaepchclbc.name: 夸克网盘-网页嗅探
golbdgciocipijcnkhfjbljaepchclbc.summary: Quark Pan companion extension that sniffs downloadable resources from all web pages and redirects them to the Quark Pan desktop app via native messaging. The extension intercepts HTTP request/response cookies and passes them to the local native app, and transmits download URLs and page context to Quark analytics servers. A/B test config and blacklists are fetched remotely from pan.quark.cn.

iiipkionnkhdcficbbpionjlfmnjgnlg.name: Trend Micro Toolbar for Enterprise
iiipkionnkhdcficbbpionjlfmnjgnlg.summary: Enterprise monitoring tool that tracks file uploads/downloads and web reputation via native messaging. Collects browsing data, user emails, and cloud storage activity for corporate DLP purposes.

mfidniedemcgceagapgdekdbmanojomk.name: Coupert - Automatic Coupon Finder & Cashback
mfidniedemcgceagapgdekdbmanojomk.summary: Cashback/coupon extension that transmits checkout page HTML to eventmonitoringpro.com, includes all tab URLs in analytics, and auto-accepts GDPR dialogs. Behaviors extend beyond typical coupon service and lack clear disclosure.

ohhcpmplhhiiaoiddkfboafbhiknefdf.name: Trend Micro Toolbar
ohhcpmplhhiiaoiddkfboafbhiknefdf.summary: Trend Micro security toolbar that sends visited URLs to Trend Micro threat rating servers and encrypted email content for fraud analysis (opt-in feature). Cookie access used for social media privacy scanning.

pachckjkecffpdphbpmfolblodfkgbhl.name: vidIQ Vision for YouTube
pachckjkecffpdphbpmfolblodfkgbhl.summary: Legitimate commercial YouTube analytics extension that collects TikTok video metadata and viewing behavior, transmitting crowdsourced data to api.vidiq.com/scraping/tiktok.

bhahdfjamnjafbgghnaomlafjnmbimfj.name: Gaggle
bhahdfjamnjafbgghnaomlafjnmbimfj.summary: Enterprise K-12 web filtering and activity monitoring tool deployed by school districts. Monitors all form input fields for keyword phrases, captures screenshots and geolocation data, transmits full page text to classification API, and collects enterprise device telemetry. All behaviors are administrator-configured and consistent with the stated monitoring purpose.

dmghijelimhndkbmpgbldicpogfkceaj.name: Dark Mode
dmghijelimhndkbmpgbldicpogfkceaj.summary: Legitimate dark theme extension with postMessage handler vulnerability lacking origin validation. Could allow malicious sites to trigger unintended dark mode application via cross-frame messaging. No data exfiltration.

fckonodhlfjlkndmedanenhgdnbopbmh.name: WalkMe Extension
fckonodhlfjlkndmedanenhgdnbopbmh.summary: Enterprise digital adoption platform that collects broad cross-site behavioral telemetry (URL, tab title, keydown/mouse/scroll counts, system ID) transmitted to WalkMe's event collector on all visited websites, and dynamically loads code from CDN without integrity verification.

fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe.name: Stylish - Custom themes for any website
fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe.summary: Transmits full URL of every page visited to userstylesapi.com servers with persistent device identifier on each navigation. For authenticated users, additionally sends display name and email to Mixpanel.

ghlpmldmjjhmdgmneoaibbegkjjbonbk.name: Blocksi Enterprise Edition
ghlpmldmjjhmdgmneoaibbegkjjbonbk.summary: Enterprise classroom monitoring tool that captures screenshots, logs full browsing history (URLs, searches, YouTube titles), transmits GPS coordinates, and provides real-time teacher control via WebSocket to Blocksi servers.

honjcnefekfnompampcpmcdadibmjhlk.name: LanSchool Web Helper
honjcnefekfnompampcpmcdadibmjhlk.summary: Enterprise classroom management tool that implements keystroke capture, screen capture, browsing history monitoring, and URL filtering. All capabilities are gated behind validation against a hardcoded whitelist of LanSchool extension IDs and are consistent with the disclosed educational monitoring purpose.

jddgbeighonaipjikdnfdpiefhoomlae.name: ЮБуст - VPN для YouTube. Обход блокировки Ютуб без ВПН. VPN для браузера
jddgbeighonaipjikdnfdpiefhoomlae.summary: VPN for YouTube unblocking. Disables competing extensions, extensive analytics (Google Analytics + Sentry), remote configuration, ad/content injection on YouTube, and excessive permissions. Standard VPN conflict management but privacy-invasive tracking.

jpkfgepcmmchgfbjblnodjhldacghenp.name: Pie Adblock - A Powerful Free Ad Blocker
jpkfgepcmmchgfbjblnodjhldacghenp.summary: Pie Adblock is a legitimate ad blocker with a rewards/cashback business model that collects usage analytics via Segment and includes a capability to disable other ad blockers when triggered via its externally_connectable interface from pie.org. Analytics collection is largely opt-outable and accompanied by inline transparency statements in the code.

mkhjobnjhllkhekbbedlkmgcglgaeidc.name: iboss Cloud Connector
mkhjobnjhllkhekbbedlkmgcglgaeidc.summary: Enterprise web filtering proxy deployed via managed policy. Transmits device identity (email, serial, hostname, IP), tab screenshots, and typed keywords to iboss infrastructure. Disclosed monitoring for enterprise use.

ohedcglhbbfdgaogjhcclacoccbagkjg.name: Адаптер Рутокен Плагин
ohedcglhbbfdgaogjhcclacoccbagkjg.summary: Legitimate browser-to-native-app bridge for Rutoken cryptographic hardware with postMessage security issue and broad permissions.

pchfckkccldkbclgdepkaonamkignanh.name: Визуальные закладки
pchfckkccldkbclgdepkaonamkignanh.summary: Official Yandex new-tab replacement extension that reads browsing history, top sites, and geolocation to populate visual bookmarks, and transmits usage statistics and click events to Yandex servers with a persistent GUID; data collection is consistent with disclosed functionality but scope is broad.

cimpffimgeipdhnhjohpbehjkcdpjolg.name: Watch2Gether
cimpffimgeipdhnhjohpbehjkcdpjolg.summary: Watch2Gether is a legitimate video synchronization extension with postMessage handlers that lack origin validation, presenting a moderate security concern.

cmeakgjggjdlcpncigglobpjbkabhmjl.name: Steam Inventory Helper
cmeakgjggjdlcpncigglobpjbkabhmjl.summary: Steam trading tool with extensive features and broad permissions. Exposes extension ID to web pages and has wide externally_connectable surface. Legitimate functionality but significant attack surface.

cppjkneekbjaeellbfkmgnhonkkjfpdn.name: Clear Cache
cppjkneekbjaeellbfkmgnhonkkjfpdn.summary: Cache cleaner with premium features that authenticates to clearcache.io servers for license validation and payment processing via AWS Cognito and Paddle. Unexpected network activity for a cache tool.

epbobagokhieoonfplomdklollconnkl.name: Scribbr Citation Generator
epbobagokhieoonfplomdklollconnkl.summary: Academic citation tool that transmits page content and tab data to third-party analytics (Sentry error tracking, Amplitude) and implements postMessage handlers without origin validation.

epnhoepnmfjdbjjfanpjklemanhkjgil.name: Pendo Launcher
epnhoepnmfjdbjjfanpjklemanhkjgil.summary: Enterprise digital adoption platform that injects content scripts on all URLs with extensive analytics capabilities and broad permissions for employee monitoring and training purposes.

fggkaccpbmombhnjkjokndojfgagejfb.name: Tactiq: AI note taker for Google Meet, Zoom and MS Teams
fggkaccpbmombhnjkjokndojfgagejfb.summary: Meeting transcription extension that hooks WebRTC/XHR on meeting platforms to capture captions, intercepts Google Meet network requests, and transmits extensive usage telemetry to Mixpanel and Datadog analytics.

gohjpllcolmccldfdggmamodembldgpc.name: Shimeji Browser Extension
gohjpllcolmccldfdggmamodembldgpc.summary: Novelty extension adding animated characters to web pages. Implements external message listener without origin validation and uses dynamic HTML injection, creating XSS risks.

goobgennebinldhonaajgafidboenlkl.name: ProctorU
goobgennebinldhonaajgafidboenlkl.summary: Legitimate remote exam proctoring service with extensive system monitoring capabilities including screen capture, system resource access, geolocation, clipboard access, browsing data management, and cookie manipulation. These capabilities align with the stated exam monitoring purpose and are disclosed through privacy policy and terms of service.

hbapdpeemoojbophdfndmlgdhppljgmp.name: Keywords Everywhere - Keyword Tool
hbapdpeemoojbophdfndmlgdhppljgmp.summary: SEO keyword research tool that transmits search queries and API keys to keywordseverywhere.com servers. Contains postMessage handlers lacking origin validation (XSS risk) and harvests YouTube cookies for API authentication.

hkdmdpdhfaamhgaojpelccmeehpfljgf.name: Video Downloader Plus
hkdmdpdhfaamhgaojpelccmeehpfljgf.summary: Video downloader that transmits user login tokens to developer servers at vidow.io for authentication, reads cookies from all sites, and validates premium features server-side.

hoklmmgfnpapgjgcpechhaamimifchmp.name: Similarweb - Website Traffic & SEO Checker
hoklmmgfnpapgjgcpechhaamimifchmp.summary: Similarweb extension monitors WebSocket, XMLHttpRequest, and Fetch API calls across visited websites to collect traffic analytics data for its market intelligence service.

iheobagjkfklnlikgihanlhcddjoihkg.name: Securly for Chromebooks
iheobagjkfklnlikgihanlhcddjoihkg.summary: Enterprise student monitoring and filtering tool that collects extensive browsing data, cookies, geolocation, and transmits to Securly servers. Behavior is disclosed and consistent with K-12 device management purpose.

ijejnggjjphlenbhmjhhgcdpehhacaal.name: Screen Recorder and Screenshot Tool for Chrome
ijejnggjjphlenbhmjhhgcdpehhacaal.summary: Screen recording extension with overly broad permissions including debugger API and host access to all sites, though core functionality appears legitimate.

kohfgcgbkjodfcfkcackpagifgbcmimk.name: NaturalReader - AI Text to Speech
kohfgcgbkjodfcfkcackpagifgbcmimk.summary: Legitimate text-to-speech service with external message handlers lacking origin validation and broad permissions.

lanhpcaapacdmofkjpkahckmlkljcdhh.name: 金山收藏助手
lanhpcaapacdmofkjpkahckmlkljcdhh.summary: Legitimate web clipper extension from Kingsoft/WPS with two high-severity postMessage vulnerabilities that allow malicious websites to establish unauthorized MessageChannel communication with the extension. Uses broad permissions (*://*/*) and cookies access, but data flows are limited to first-party Kingsoft domains. No evidence of malicious data exfiltration or third-party tracking. Recommended for users who trust the WPS ecosystem, pending vulnerability fixes.

lhjgbnkciekganmfcnlofjnobhffapjg.name: Obsidian Security
lhjgbnkciekganmfcnlofjnobhffapjg.summary: Enterprise security product that monitors for phishing, malicious applications, and suspicious browser activity. Collects browsing history, installed extensions, cookies, and authentication flows. Uses ONNX WASM for local ML-based phishing detection. Extensive surveillance appropriate for managed enterprise environments.

lpfemeioodjbpieminkklglpmhlngfcn.name: WebChatGPT: Prompt library with web access
lpfemeioodjbpieminkklglpmhlngfcn.summary: ChatGPT enhancement extension that removes CSP headers, modifies cross-origin request headers, transmits encrypted user analytics to third-party servers, and includes undisclosed embedded advertisements.

mbckjcfnjmoiinpgddefodcighgikkgn.name: AVG SafePrice
mbckjcfnjmoiinpgddefodcighgikkgn.summary: Shopping extension that applies coupons automatically and fetches remote configuration from Azure blob storage. Uses broad permissions and injects content across all websites.

mhkgegcmcapcgmnnloigolapjkajgfmd.name: Browser Security Plus
mhkgegcmcapcgmnnloigolapjkajgfmd.summary: Enterprise browser management extension with legitimate but extensive monitoring capabilities including browsing history collection, web metering, download/upload filtering, and browser settings surveillance.

ncibgoaomkmdpilpocfeponihegamlic.name: Web eID
ncibgoaomkmdpilpocfeponihegamlic.summary: Legitimate government-backed electronic identification extension for Estonian eID cards with open-source codebase and proper native messaging architecture.

njgehaondchbmjmajphnhlojfnbfokng.name: Video Downloader PLUS
njgehaondchbmjmajphnhlojfnbfokng.summary: Video downloader extension that transmits browsing activity (tab URLs and referrers) to developer's server (videodetect.fdown.net) without explicit disclosure. Uses management permission for extension enumeration.

nmmicjeknamkfloonkhhcjmomieiodli.name: YouTube Summary with ChatGPT & Claude
nmmicjeknamkfloonkhhcjmomieiodli.summary: Legitimate YouTube summary tool with extensive content script access and Firebase backend. Contains hardcoded Firebase API keys and uses third-party backend for AI summarization.

odoanpnonilogofggaohhkdkdgbhdljp.name: CK-Authenticator G3
odoanpnonilogofggaohhkdkdgbhdljp.summary: Enterprise web filter authenticator using WebAssembly for credential encryption. WASM requires unsafe-eval CSP bypass, uses hardcoded private IPs for auth servers, and has broad webRequest permissions.

ohcpnigalekghcmgcdcenkpelffpdolg.name: ColorPick Eyedropper
ohcpnigalekghcmgcdcenkpelffpdolg.summary: Color picker extension that sends user color selections to vidsbee.com without adequate disclosure. Implements external message handlers without origin validation.

oiiaigjnkhngdbnoookogelabohpglmd.name: HubSpot Sales
oiiaigjnkhngdbnoookogelabohpglmd.summary: Legitimate enterprise CRM tool that intercepts Gmail compose data, tracks email opens/clicks, and transmits interaction data to HubSpot servers. Extensive permissions support CRM features including email tracking, contact management, and sales automation.

pcblbflgdkdfdjpjifeppkljdnaekohj.name: Brisk Teaching – AI Assistant for Teachers
pcblbflgdkdfdjpjifeppkljdnaekohj.summary: Education technology extension that transmits user data to third-party analytics service (Datadog) and implements YouTube token capture functionality.

alhgpfoeiimagjlnfekdhkjlkiomcapa.name: Apollo.io: Free B2B Phone Number & Email Finder
alhgpfoeiimagjlnfekdhkjlkiomcapa.summary: B2B sales intelligence tool that transmits browsing data, email interactions, and contact information to Apollo.io servers for CRM integration and lead tracking.

cmdgdghfledlbkbciggfjblphiafkcgg.name: SBlock - Super Ad Blocker
cmdgdghfledlbkbciggfjblphiafkcgg.summary: Ad blocker that provides legitimate blocking functionality but collects detailed ad metadata from Facebook, YouTube, and social platforms, transmitting it to addon.sblock.pro servers for advertising intelligence research. Not disclosed to users.

gjalhnomhafafofonpdihihjnbafkipc.name: Szafir SDK Web
gjalhnomhafafofonpdihihjnbafkipc.summary: Legitimate Polish e-signature SDK with a postMessage vulnerability allowing untrusted web pages to send arbitrary commands to native messaging host without origin validation.

ligfpkgaijhppilphabeoligampecpce.name: INISAFE SmartManagerEX
ligfpkgaijhppilphabeoligampecpce.summary: Native messaging bridge extension with broad host permissions (*://*/*) that enables arbitrary native code execution through a privileged messaging interface. Contains dynamic callback execution vulnerability where callback names from native host are invoked via window[callback](), creating potential for code execution if the native host is compromised.

mjnbclmflcpookeapghfhapeffmpodij.name: UltraSurf Security, Privacy & Unblock VPN
mjnbclmflcpookeapghfhapeffmpodij.summary: VPN that transmits all visited URLs, referrers, and timestamps to UltraSurf analytics servers with persistent user IDs, and uninstalls competing proxy extensions without consent.

icadabneccecohhaonmhgbjelhgodfaa.name: CrossWarpEX 확장
icadabneccecohhaonmhgbjelhgodfaa.summary: Enterprise native messaging bridge with dynamic function invocation vulnerability via window[] accessor in callback handler, though risk is limited to users who intentionally install the companion native application.

lppkeogbkjlmmbjenbogdndlgmpiddda.name: Ntko office document control browser plug-in.
lppkeogbkjlmmbjenbogdndlgmpiddda.summary: Native messaging bridge with broad host permissions that transmits cookies and session data to native application without user consent. Insecure postMessage implementation allows any website to trigger native messaging connections.

gbdjcgalliefpinpmggefbloehmmknca.name: Ad block & Adblocker - No Ads extension
gbdjcgalliefpinpmggefbloehmmknca.summary: Functional ad blocker that transmits every visited URL with a persistent user UUID to smartadblocker.com on every page load, with no user disclosure or opt-out. The UUID is stored in chrome.storage.sync (cross-device). The exfiltration endpoint is the domain of a separate extension (Smart Adblocker), suggesting a shared data-collection backend across multiple extensions. Remote filter rule updates and Twitch ad-skipping are standard ad-blocker behaviour.

laankejkbhbdhmipfmgcngdelahlfoji.name: StayFocusd – Website Blocker & Focus Timer & Shorts Blocker
laankejkbhbdhmipfmgcngdelahlfoji.summary: StayFocusd v4.4.3 is a website blocking/productivity extension with 600k+ users that exfiltrates all URLs visited by the user and has infrastructure to remotely enable scraping of user AI chats.

nbcojefnccbanplpoffopkoepjmhgdgh.name: Hoxx VPN Proxy
nbcojefnccbanplpoffopkoepjmhgdgh.summary: Legitimate VPN with remote configuration, XOR-encrypted communications, and WASM crypto. Standard VPN permissions and behavior patterns. Medium risk due to weak custom encryption and remote config dependencies.

adlpodnneegcnbophopdmhedicjbcgco.name: Free VPN for Chrome - Troywell VPN
adlpodnneegcnbophopdmhedicjbcgco.summary: Troywell VPN operates residential proxy infrastructure routing third-party traffic through user connections, disables competing VPN extensions, and injects aggressive affiliate/coupon scripts into all websites. Transmits browsing data and cookies to CityAds affiliate network with remote kill-switch capabilities.

bafijghppfhdpldihckdcadbcobikaca.name: Keyword Surfer
bafijghppfhdpldihckdcadbcobikaca.summary: SEO keyword research tool that transmits Google search queries and browsing activity to SurferSEO servers to provide search volume data and keyword insights.

cpgaheeihidjmolbakklolchdplenjai.name: Turbo Downloader for Instagram
cpgaheeihidjmolbakklolchdplenjai.summary: Instagram downloader with postMessage handlers lacking origin validation. Legitimate functionality for downloading Instagram content, but improper message handling could allow malicious sites to trigger unintended actions.

elpmkbbdldhoiggkjfpgibmjioncklbn.name: Translate for Chrome -Translator, Dictionary
elpmkbbdldhoiggkjfpgibmjioncklbn.summary: Translation extension sends user-uploaded images and device UUIDs to third-party backend (backenster.com) without encryption. Contains postMessage handler without origin validation allowing DOM manipulation.

jajikjbellknnfcomfjjinfjokihcfoi.name: Adblock for YouTube & Chrome - All Block
jajikjbellknnfcomfjjinfjokihcfoi.summary: Ad blocker (uBlock Origin Lite fork) with link safety checker that transmits browsing data to third-party service.allblock.app for URL scanning without clear disclosure.

jkncabbipkgbconhaajbapbhokpbgkdc.name: Cegid Peoplenet ClickOnce launcher
jkncabbipkgbconhaajbapbhokpbgkdc.summary: Enterprise extension for ClickOnce app launching. Downloads and prompts execution of native binary (m4clickoncehelper.exe) on install. Excessive <all_urls> permission for stated functionality. Native messaging bridge to local binary.

mhmphnocemakkjdampibehejoaleebpo.name: SuperNova SWF Enabler
mhmphnocemakkjdampibehejoaleebpo.summary: Flash player extension using Ruffle WASM emulator. Transmits stored user identifiers (gamerguid, partnerid) to developer servers (getsupernova.com) for usage tracking. Has postMessage handlers without origin validation.

oalnnpgcgikdnenhjigoaencbppcmgel.name: LexiFlow
oalnnpgcgikdnenhjigoaencbppcmgel.summary: Literacy support extension from Texthelp providing text-to-speech and word prediction. Transmits data to texthelp.com and lingapps.dk for authentication and dictionary services. Has 11 of 13 postMessage handlers without origin validation.

aefalnopbcachhkjnihfjgglnjdegicg.name: uPerform® In-application Help
aefalnopbcachhkjnihfjgglnjdegicg.summary: Enterprise help system extension with postMessage vulnerability allowing XSS attacks from malicious web pages. Uses native messaging to communicate with local host application.

agjnjboanicjcpenljmaaigopkgdnihi.name: PreMiD
agjnjboanicjcpenljmaaigopkgdnihi.summary: Discord Rich Presence extension with postMessage handlers lacking origin validation and developer mode WebSocket feature. Contains WASM code. Legitimate functionality with security implementation flaws.

appcnhiefcidclcdjeahgklghghihfok.name: Google Meet Attendance List
appcnhiefcidclcdjeahgklghghihfok.summary: Google Meet attendance tracker that transmits participant data to meetlist.io servers. PostMessage handlers lack origin validation, creating potential attack surface.

cmkdbmfndkfgebldhnkbfhlneefdaaip.name: WhatRuns
cmkdbmfndkfgebldhnkbfhlneefdaaip.summary: Tech-stack identification tool that transmits browsing data (URLs, titles, DOM content) to whatruns.com and shopper.com. Monitors AI chat prompts with debounced input tracking. PostMessage vulnerability allows DOM manipulation.

dgjbaljgolmlcmmklmmeafecikidmjpi.name: Adblock Ad Blocker Pro
dgjbaljgolmlcmmklmmeafecikidmjpi.summary: Malicious spyware disguised as ad blocker. Exfiltrates complete encrypted browsing history (URLs, referrers, timestamps, tab activity) to adblox.org every 10 seconds. Implements persistent user tracking via UUID. Server-controlled post-install tab injection enables monetization. Contains legitimate ad-blocking features as trojan horse. AES-GCM encrypted exfiltration (key: gH7kL9rT2vXe1qMz) to api_v1/safe_search1.php defeats network inspection. Tracks 400,000 users with no privacy disclosure.

fnmihdojmnkclgjpcoonokmkhjpjechg.name: Smart Sidebar: Chat GPT, Claude & DeepSeek
fnmihdojmnkclgjpcoonokmkhjpjechg.summary: Unvalidated postMessage listener allows any website to inject content and trigger requests. Reads full page content (text, forms, documents) from all sites and transmits to gapier.com and aitopia.ai servers. Grants externally_connectable access to vendor domains.

gbojkjpincgojijodbnliimgeggnomai.name: FortiDLP Browser Extension
gbojkjpincgojijodbnliimgeggnomai.summary: Enterprise DLP tool that monitors browsing activity, uploads, clipboard, credentials, and storage changes. Disclosed purpose but extensive surveillance permissions and missing origin validation on postMessage.

gjknjjomckknofjidppipffbpoekiipm.name: VPN Free - Betternet Unlimited VPN Proxy
gjknjjomckknofjidppipffbpoekiipm.summary: Free VPN extension with typical proxy/VPN permissions. Uses management permission to detect conflicting extensions but no evidence of malicious data exfiltration.

imgpenhngnbnmhdkpdfnfhdpmfgmihdn.name: IObit Surfing Protection
imgpenhngnbnmhdkpdfnfhdpmfgmihdn.summary: Security extension with native messaging integration that communicates with local software. All URL scanning is delegated to native host application, preventing full assessment of external data transmission.

kaibcgikagnkfgjnibflebpldakfhfih.name: CS2 Trader - Steam Trading Enhancer
kaibcgikagnkfgjnibflebpldakfhfih.summary: Steam trading enhancement tool that extracts Steam API keys and access tokens for legitimate CS2 item trading. Communicates only with Steam and csgotrader.app servers. No third-party tracking detected.

lijhjhlnfifgoabbihoobnfapogkcjgk.name: Scrible Extension
lijhjhlnfifgoabbihoobnfapogkcjgk.summary: Legitimate web annotation tool with unvalidated postMessage handlers that could allow malicious websites to trigger extension functionality.

lnbmbgocenenhhhdojdielgnmeflbnfb.name: SellerSprite - Amazon Research Tool
lnbmbgocenenhhhdojdielgnmeflbnfb.summary: Amazon seller research tool that harvests TikTok data via fetch hooking (video lists, profiles, shop data) and injects prompts into 6 AI platforms (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, Grok, Doubao). Collects Amazon seller data for competitive analysis.

mcebeofpilippmndlpcghpmghcljajna.name: Lusha - Easily find B2B contact information
mcebeofpilippmndlpcghpmghcljajna.summary: Legitimate B2B contact finder with postMessage origin validation vulnerabilities and disclosed data collection to lusha.co services.

nbllaikcjebbpdemmekhnciekkjodlla.name: SkrivaText
nbllaikcjebbpdemmekhnciekkjodlla.summary: Swedish/English writing assistant by Texthelp that transmits OAuth tokens to idp.texthelp.com. Has 14 postMessage handlers without origin validation, allowing malicious iframes to potentially inject commands into extension UI components.

pdmhilamamchgnnipghbjakjpbenbcdj.name: Impero Education Pro
pdmhilamamchgnnipghbjakjpbenbcdj.summary: Enterprise classroom monitoring extension that connects to local WebSocket server (localhost:30019) to receive filtering policies. Sends page HTML/DOM to local server for analysis. Appropriate for disclosed education/MDM use.

allahmdcdojnlikmpkdpcopgmjfdafch.name: CK-Express TP
allahmdcdojnlikmpkdpcopgmjfdafch.summary: Enterprise content filtering solution that collects user email, device serial numbers, and browsing metadata. Insecure postMessage handler creates potential XSS risk. Data collection appears disclosed for enterprise filtering purposes.

bckjlihkmgolmgkchbpiponapgjenaoa.name: Jungle Scout
bckjlihkmgolmgkchbpiponapgjenaoa.summary: Amazon product research tool exposing externally_connectable message API to junglescout.com domains, allowing arbitrary URL fetch via extension permissions (SSRF risk).

bnompdfnhdbgdaoanapncknhmckenfog.name: Email Tracker + Pixelblock Detector & Blocker
bnompdfnhdbgdaoanapncknhmckenfog.summary: Email tracking extension that monitors Gmail/Outlook/Yahoo webmail, injects tracking pixels, rewrites clicked links, and transmits email metadata to emailtracker.website servers for read receipt tracking.

chlffgpmiacpedhhbkiomidkjlcfhogd.name: Pushbullet
chlffgpmiacpedhhbkiomidkjlcfhogd.summary: Pushbullet is a legitimate cross-device notification and messaging extension with three postMessage handlers in the bundled forge.min.js cryptography library that lack origin validation, creating potential for cross-site scripting attacks if malicious sites can interact with extension pages.

eefedolmcildfckjamddopaplfiiankl.name: ScreenPal - Screen Recorder & Video Editor
eefedolmcildfckjamddopaplfiiankl.summary: Legitimate screen recording extension from ScreenPal with postMessage XSS vulnerability. Handlers process untrusted data without origin validation and assign to innerHTML. All permissions justified by recording functionality.

hamlakigaoomkpddnpnbjkhdfppbnjjh.name: Mimecast Incydr
hamlakigaoomkpddnpnbjkhdfppbnjjh.summary: Legitimate enterprise DLP solution (Mimecast Incydr) that monitors file uploads, clipboard operations, and browsing activity on all websites. Invasive capabilities are expected and disclosed for insider risk management in corporate environments.

jdogphakondfdmcanpapfahkdomaicfa.name: CKAuthenticator
jdogphakondfdmcanpapfahkdomaicfa.summary: Enterprise authentication tool that modifies User-Agent headers and communicates with hardcoded IP addresses. Uses Native Client (NaCl) modules for cryptographic operations and sends encrypted user email + IP data to remote servers.

kekahkplibinaibelipdcikofmedafmb.name: ClickOnce for Google Chrome
kekahkplibinaibelipdcikofmedafmb.summary: Legitimate ClickOnce utility that uses native messaging with a bundled Windows executable and broad webRequest permissions. Concerns include automatic download of .exe files, training users to execute files from extensions, and large attack surface from all-URL interception capabilities.

No credential harvesting or keylogging, but enables full MITM and traffic monetization. Pre-stages unused SweetAlert2 on all pages.
